meta.title: The daily game of names
meta.description: Guess the hidden name in 6 tries (or less). A new puzzle is available each day!
meta.keywords: sunbit, english, puzzle, word, play, game, online, guess, daily

text.no_attempts: You haven't tried any words yet!

help.title: How to Play
help.text_1_2: Each guess must be a valid five letter word. Press the enter button to submit your guess.
help.text_1_3: After you guess, the tiles will change color to indicate which letters of your word are correct or almost correct.
help.text_2_1: is in the word and in the correct location!
help.text_2_2: is in the word, but not in the correct location.
help.text_2_3: is not present in the word you are trying to guess.
help.text_3: A new name will be available each day!
help.text_4: each 5 letter name of someone from sunbit tech group is a valid guess
help.text_4_1: if somebody's name is longer than 5 letters, you can use the first 5 letters of their name
help.text_4_2: if somebody's name is shorter than 5 letters, you can add letters from their surname to make it 5 letters
help.text_4_3: for example: if the name is 'John Smith', you can use 'JOHNS' or 'SMITH' as a guess
help.text_4_4: if someone's name is 'Alberto', you can use 'ALBER' as a guess
